name: Reactive Shields
desc: Reduces damage taken by shields as hard flux levels rise up to %s at %s and above hard flux levels. In return the ship's shield arc will also go down as hard flux levels rise down to %s at %s and above hard flux levels.

name: Energy Flux Regulators
desc: Increases or decreases damage and flux cost of all energy weapons as flux levels rise and fall, up to %s and down to %s.

name: Volatile Warheads
desc: Increases the damage of missiles by %s but decreases the health of missiles by %s.

name: Subverted Shields
desc: Increases the damage taken by shields by %s and increases the chance of EMP arcing by a factor of %s. In return the shield upkeep is reduced by %s and the ship can dissipate %s of hard flux even when shields are active.

name: Conductive Rails
desc: Increases the damage, range and projectile speed of all ballistic weapons by %s but increases the flux cost by %s. Bonuses and pentalties are in full effect below %s flux levels but beyond that the efficiency of this effects are reduced.

name: Graviton Attunement Drive
desc: Increases the fleet's maximum burn by %s but increases the sensor profile and supplies used per month by a factor of %s.

name: Flux Conduction Armor
desc: Replaces the ships armor with flux conductive materials allowing accumulated flux to be stored in the armor. Increases the ship's flux capacity by %s and increases the ship's armor by %s/%s/%s/%s based on hull size but increases the damage taken by EMP weapons by %s.

name: Makeshift Missile Autoforge
desc: When missile weapons run out of ammo a dedicated autoforge is activated, it restores %s of ammo every %s.

name: Enhanced Autoloaders
desc: Augments the ammo transfer and accelerates ammo feeding of all ballisitc weapons, allowing for an increase in ammo regeneration, ammo capacity and fire rate by %s but lowers the damage by %s.

name: Energized Capacitors
desc: Streams of energy is continually directed to all capacitors of all energy weapons, allowing for an increase in ammo regeneration, ammo capacity and fire rate by %s but lowers the damage by %s.

name: Subatomic Accelerator
desc: Installs a device that accelerates the particles that makes up an atom, increasing the projectile speed of all energy weapons by %s.

name: Extended Barrels
desc: Extends the barrels of all ballistic weapons allowing expanding gas to travel and push the bullet further before leaving the barrel, increasing the projectile speed by %s.

name: Volatile Ammunition
desc: Ammunition used by all ballistic weapons are replaced with radioactive ammunition, allowing for an increase in damage by %s but lowers the fire rate by a factor of %s while increasing the flux cost by a factor of %s.

name: Overloaded Capacitors
desc: A surge of energy is directed to all energy weapons overcharging them, allowing for an increase in damage by %s but lowers the fire rate by a factor of %s while increasing the flux cost by a factor of %s.

name: Reactive Subsystems
desc: Replaces subsystems with reactive machines, a basic type of AI that only reacts to its given scenario but cannot go past it. This increases the max combat readiness by %s and increases the peak performance time by %s but in return it increases the rate at which combat readiness degrades by %s.

name: External Cargo Holds
desc: Installs cargo containers or pods around the ship, allowing for an increase in cargo capacity by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hull size but reduces the flux dissipation, speed, and maneuverability by %s.

name: Maximized Drive Field
desc: Enhances the ship's drive field to its maximum capabilities, increasing the max burn level by %s but increases the fuel used per lightyear by a factor of %s.

name: Overloaded Drive Field
desc: Enhances the ship's drive field but pushes it beyond its capabilities, increasing the max burn level by %s but increases the fuel used per lightyear by a factor of %s, increases the sensor profile by %s, and decreases the sensor strength by %s.
